Description: Limestone ostracon; 6 lines of text on recto and verso containing a fragmentary part of Psalm 18.8, 36.1, 78.9(?) and 98.6; edge decorated with cruciform motif with traces of text.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Henri Édouard Naville (1893-1899, on behalf of EEF)
Bibliographic references: Biedenkopf-Ziehner 2000a / Koptische Ostraka I: Ostraka aus dem Britischen Museum in London (311-313, pl.45 and 46)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (82910) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/82910)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. II 44 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
